main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Levelland, Texas in November 1957 involving two egg-shaped objects resembling basketballs, one positioned on top of the other.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 40 minutes and included a detailed observation of the objects' sizes and shapes., A witness described two antennae-like projections on the bottom of the object, with one being longer than the other., The objects exhibited erratic movements, moving, stopping, and then moving again., The sighting occurred at night with a visibility of over 45 miles., There were conflicting reports about the nature of the observations, with speculation regarding possible aircraft or balloon sightings.
witness description: members of the Plains City Police and other civilians
